## Basics of using git

Git is a distributed version control system (VCS) that is very popular 

The core steps to using git involve 

1. Initiate a git repository
  In RStudio, we just click a little radio button on project creation 
  At command line we type: 
  `git init`
  
2. Do your normal work
  Add files
  Modify files, etc
  
3. Add your important files to "stage"
  In RStudio we click "staged" radio button
  `git add your filename`
  
4. Commit your staged files to the repository
  In RStudio you just hit the "Command button and add a msg `git commit -m "your wee msg`
